intro: Saurauia darikalteng, commonly known as the Darikalteng stonecress, is a flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Ericaceae, which includes heathers and related plants. The plant is characterized by its compact growth habit and small, clustered leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale pink, arranged in dense inflorescences. Saurauia darikalteng is adapted to rocky and well-drained soils, often found in alpine or subalpine environments.
